name: Seaside Siren
desc: When an ally character and their memosprite gain "Obsession," they accumulate an equal number of Charge stacks. Upon reaching 50 stacks, they enter the "Dirge" state. When a character in the "Dirge" state launches an attack, they consume 16 Charge stacks to deal 3 instances of "Aftertaste" DMG equal to 150% of their Max HP to the attacked enemy target. The state ends when Charge stacks reach 0. Charge stacks can still be accumulated while in the "Dirge" state.
